# This replicates the paper result for "Fern"
# when trained to 200k iters. Settings are the
# same for all other LLFF-style real scenes.

expname = nerf_gem
basedir = ~/local/logs
datadir = ~/local/data/stanford_eval/gem
dataset_type = stanford
factor = 2

no_batching = False

use_viewdirs = True
lrate_decay = 250
raw_noise_std = 1.0

N_samples = 64
N_importance = 128
N_rand = 1024

i_weights = 10000
i_video = 100000
i_testset = 100000
